node.statement: To derive B'(x) = e^x B(x): Differentiate B(x) = sum_{n>=0} B_n x^n/n\! term-by-term (justified by absolute convergence from exp-series). B'(x) = sum_{n>=1} B_n x^{n-1}/(n-1)\! = sum_{m>=0} B_{m+1} x^m/m\!. By the Bell recurrence B_{n+1} = sum_{k=0}^{n} C(n,k) B_k, we have B'(x) = sum_{m>=0} (sum_{k=0}^{m} C(m,k) B_k) x^m/m\!. Using e^x = sum_{j>=0} x^j/j\! and Cauchy product (justified by fubini-tonelli for absolute convergence), this equals e^x * B(x).
